parameters.crs: PROJCS["Equidistant_Cylindrical / World Geodetic System 1984", GEOGCS["World Geodetic System 1984", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]], PROJECTION["Equidistant_Cylindrical"], PARAMETER["central_meridian", 0.0], PARAMETER["latitude_of_origin", 0.0], PARAMETER["standard_parallel_1", 0.0], PARAMETER["false_easting", 0.0], PARAMETER["false_northing", 0.0], UNIT["m", 1.0], AXIS["Easting", EAST], AXIS["Northing", NORTH]]
